msg.msgText: The XA transaction branch can be rolled back by using the "imaserver rollback" command. Use this command only when you are certain that the transaction cannot be resolved by the normal protocols. Issuing this command might result in the loss of transactional integrity between resource managers for a distributed transaction. SYNTAX: imaserver rollback help imaserver rollback Transaction "XID=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver rollback Transaction "XID=57415344:0000014247FEBB3D000000012008CC78A1A981840C3350B9E23A3C2EFB8E5A6D864A89C0:00000001"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
